description: I'm a Mechanical engineer from Peachtree City, Georgia. Fall 13' class BK 1966. Big fan of the outdoors, love hiking, camping, climbing, caving, mountain biking, sailing, and pretty much any other outdoor activity you could think of.
aspects: I love Lambda Chi, because there is something for everyone. You will make connections and friends that will last your whole life. Lambda Chi offers all kinds of opportunities for its members, that range from study programs to paint balling. All in all it is a fantastic organization.
quotes: "I immediately regret this decision." - Ron Burgundy
name: Luke Runyan
